org.springframework.integration.smpp.core

Class DataCodingSpecification

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.integration.smpp.core.DataCodingSpecification

  • public class DataCodingSpecification
extends java.lang.Object
    This is specification for data coding based on SMPP API and Java charset.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Johanes Soetanto

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataCodingSpecification

        public DataCodingSpecification()

    • Method Detail

      • getMaxCharacters

        public static int getMaxCharacters(byte dataCoding)
        Get maximum characters for data coding. Returns
        • 160 for data coding 0/1
        • 70 for data coding 5/8/10/13/14
        • 140 for others
        Parameters:
        dataCoding - data coding
        Returns:
        maximum characters can be used for the text with specified data coding

      • getCharsetName

        public static java.lang.String getCharsetName(byte dataCoding)
        Get charset name based on data coding. Returns:
        • US-ASCII for data coding 1
        • ISO-8859-1 for data coding 3
        • ISO-8859-5 for data coding 6
        • ISO-8859-8 for data coding 7
        • UTF-16 for data coding 8
        • EUC-KR for data coding 14
        • EUC-JP for data coding 5/10/13
        • UTF-8 for others
        Parameters:
        dataCoding - data coding
        Returns:
        charset name related to the data coding

      • getMessageInBytes

        public static byte[] getMessageInBytes(java.lang.String message,
                       byte dataCoding)
        Get message in bytes. This will use getCharsetName(byte) to get the message in bytes.
        Parameters:
        message - short message
        dataCoding - data coding
        Returns:
        message in bytes based on the data coding
